code: import{AppBar,Box,Button,Toolbar,Typography}from"@mui/material";import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{BackButton}from"../BackButton";import{useAuth,useAuthUser,useProfile}from"../data-access";import{ProfileDisplayNameForm}from"./ProfileDisplayNameForm";import{ProfilePictureForm}from"./ProfilePictureForm";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export var ProfilePage=function ProfilePage(){var _useAuth=useAuth(),signOut=_useAuth.signOut;var _useAuthUser=useAuthUser(),userId=_useAuthUser.userId;var _useProfile=useProfile({userId:userId}),profileState=_useProfile.profileState,updateProfilePicture=_useProfile.updateProfilePicture,updateProfile=_useProfile.updateProfile;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppBar,{position:"sticky",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Toolbar,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BackButton,{edge:"start",sx:{marginRight:2}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",sx:{flex:1},children:"Profile"})]})}),profileState.status==="success"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{p:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProfilePictureForm,{profilePictureUrl:profileState.profile.profilePictureUrl,onUpdate:updateProfilePicture}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProfileDisplayNameForm,{displayName:profileState.profile.displayName,onUpdate:updateProfile}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{sx:{marginTop:2},onClick:function onClick(){signOut();},children:"Sign Out"})]})]});};
